snippet: County Judge Clay Jenkins’s hands-on approach to the Ebola emergency in Dallas has raised his profile and helped educate the public, but it has also brought criticism.
abstract: Dallas County Judge Clay Jenkins has taken hands-on approach to Ebola crisis, meeting with quarantined family of nation's first Ebola victim while working to keep Dallas calm; his efforts have raised his profile and helped educate the public, but has also brought criticism and heightened fears surrounding disease.

byline.contributor: Kevin Sack and Dave Philipps contributed from Dallas.

lead_paragraph: County Judge Clay Jenkins’s hands-on approach to the Ebola emergency in Dallas has raised his profile and helped educate the public, but it has also brought criticism.

headline.main: Dallas Official Confronts City’s Fear of Ebola in Person
headline.print_headline: Dallas Official Confronts City’s Fear of Ebola in Person
